name: The Square Ones
description:
Its Hip to be Square!

Take the square ones on an addicting adventure spanning multiple worlds and challenges. Experience the dangers of spikes, hammers, moving platforms, dropping platforms, lifts, fireballs and much more.

Swipe the screen to move your chosen square one in the direction you wish to move. Make fast and well timed maneuvers to complete each challenging level.

* 50+ awesome levels
* Boss fights
* Multiple square ones to choose from
* Amazing Graphics
* Unique gaming experience

Download and enjoy 'The Square Ones' today!
